page.post_content:
At Criniti’s, we believe that family is everything, and that's why we have created La Famiglia, a VIP rewards program that goes above and beyond the typical loyalty card. Our program is designed to reward our valued customers with exclusive offers and rewards that truly show our appreciation for being a part of our family. As a member of La Famiglia, you will enjoy a variety of benefits that are tailored to make your experience at Criniti’s even more special. Some of the key features of our program include the following: As a part of the Criniti’s family, you will get:
  • 7% OFF your bill: As a member, you will receive a 7% discount on your bill, which can add up to significant savings over time.
  • FREE cake and balloons on your birthday: We want to help you celebrate your special day in style! As a member, after your birthday package has been booked with us, you will receive a complimentary cake and balloons when you dine with us on your birthday. A deposit is required to avail the birthday package incentives.
  • Early access to promotions and offers: As a member of La Famiglia, you will be the first to know about upcoming promotions and offers, so you can take advantage of them before anyone else.
  • Exclusive VIP events: We believe that our members should be treated like VIPs, and that's why we will host exclusive special events just for La Famiglia members, where you can socialize, indulge in great food, and enjoy the Criniti’s experience.


La Famiglia is more than just a rewards program; it's a community of like-minded individuals who share our passion for delicious food, great company, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. When you join our La Famiglia program, you're not just getting a rewards program, you're becoming a part of the Criniti’s family, and we will welcome you with open arms. We pride ourselves on providing authentic and delicious Italian cuisine, and we strive to make every guest feel like part of our family from the moment they walk through the door. Whether you're a regular customer or just visiting for the first time, we hope you'll consider becoming a part of our La Famiglia program and experience the warmth, joy, and love that is Criniti’s. Terms & Conditions: LA Famiglia offer cannot be combined with other promotions. Not valid for events, functions, or pizza and pasta classes.
